Maximo
Just to be a bit picky, Masamune may popularly and generally be considered
to be the best ever swordsmith and is certainly the most famous, but
Muramasa could not be described as the second best by any stretch of the
imagination and he was not connected to Masamune in any way, his swords just
had a bloodthirsty reputation.
Regards
Clive
